message: Welcome! This is my first product, and I assure you it's of great value. You know the statistics: 80% of my products are high-quality, and I'm confident in what I'm selling.
Thank you for your confidence, Alice. I trust the statistics and am excited to make the purchase.

However, I assure you that the 80% high-quality statistic still holds true. This product I'm offering now is a great opportunity, and I believe it will meet your expectations.
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on the high-quality statistic and your assurance, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product. I appreciate your transparency.
